Author: vlad
Content: I think after the 3 hour Nerds documentary I posted, everybody's been watching it and nothing has been voted up since!  I'm still watching that but I'll watch your link right after.

Author: abstractbill
Title: jwz: flat-files vs databases ("To a database person, every nail looks like a thumb")

Author: Sam_Odio
Content:
This was probably one of the more motivating speeches I've heard in a while. It's especially significant once you've watched Pirates of Silicon Valley.

I can only hope that - in the next decade - some of us will be giving speeches this memorable and inspiring.
